title: Whispers - Horror Atmospheres Music Pack
description: Whispers is a high-quality pack of 15 music tracks (14 looping) composed for use in horror games.
longDescription:
Whispers is a collection of 15 atmospheric music tracks, composed for horror-themed games. The tracks loop seamlessly, surrounding the player in a fog of tension and eerie soundscapes. This pack is perfect for survival horror, psychological thrillers, and dark adventure games. A sister of the successful atmospheres pack, “Miasma”, this pack is intended to complete the pair with a less dense tone, leaving more room for sound effects and jumpscares. 


Music Demo


Tracklist:

  1. Ash (Loop) [1:30]
  2. Banshee (Loop) [1:18]
  3. Dead Silent (Loop) [1:16]
  4. Emptiness (Loop) [1:39]
  5. Flies (Loop) [1:07]
  6. Harbinger [1:02]
  7. Infrared (Loop) [1:20]
  8. Lighthouse (Loop) [1:10]
  9. Mirrors (Loop) [1:22]
  10. Sirens (Loop) [1:24]
  11. Spectres (Loop) [1:12]
  12. The Sewers (Loop) [0:51]
  13. Veils (Loop) [1:03]
  14. Whispers in the Dark (Loop) [1:04]
  15. Widowing (Loop) [1:15]




Music Quality:

Whispers was created with industry-leading software used in professional studios worldwide, each track delivers a polished, high-quality sound, elevating your game to new heights of immersion.


Technical Details:

  • 15 Stereo WAV music tracks (16-bit/44.1kHz)
  • Bit rate: 1411 kbps
  • 187MB uncompressed
  • ~19 minutes of music
  • 14 looping tracks
  • Royalty-Free license


**If you'd like to learn more about Andrew or his ongoing projects, visit andrewchamberscomposer.com
